participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and patient, he enjoys spending quality time with his kids and discussing movies.
participant_1.background: i'm a stay at home dad. i spent a decade working in the human services field. my father used to work for home depot. horror movies are my favorites.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Creative and resourceful, she often seeks to find joy in her work while facing challenges.
participant_2.background: i'm a recording engineer and own my own studio. i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year. whats up i am a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. i prefer being inside.

content.text: i am not sure . i am a librarian .
i am a huge gamer , my mom is a very good person .
